dict.string: Shion's functions are available from the status icon in the upper-right of your screen.
Having problems with Shion? Submit problems and suggestions using the issue reporter. You can find it in the Shion menu under "Report An Issue..."
To add a new device, click the "+" button in the bottom-left of the Console window. Follow the menus until you find the kind of device you want. You can add triggers and snapshots as well.
Are you an iOS user interested in using Shion on your iPad or iPhone? Learn more about the Shion mobile apps and online service at <www.shiononline.com>. (Image credit: ivyfield@flickr)

The bottom-right of the Console displays the controls for devices and a graphical view of their history. Each row represents 24 hours. Enlarge the Console to display more days or a finer-grained view.
